column1: === {{TranslateThis | anchor = en | en = TrueAchievements game ID | fr = identifiant TrueAchievements d’un jeu vidéo }} === {{Property proposal |status = not done |description = {{TranslateThis | en = identifier of a video game in the TrueAchievements database | fr = identifiant d’un jeu vidéo dans la base de données TrueAchievements }} |subject item = Q7847301 |infobox parameter = |datatype = external-id |domain = {{Q|Q7889}} |allowed values = \w[-\w]*(?:dlc/[-\w]+)? |source = https://www.trueachievements.com/games.aspx |example 1 = {{Q|Q25340021}} → [https://www.trueachievements.com/game/observer observer] |example 2 = {{Q|Q302839}} → [https://www.trueachievements.com/game/BioShock-2 BioShock-2] |example 3 = {{Q|Q24806656}} → [https://www.trueachievements.com/game/BioShock-2/dlc/Minervas-Den BioShock-2/dlc/Minervas-Den] |example 4 = {{Q|Q40889213}} → [https://www.trueachievements.com/game/Zone-of-the-Enders-HD-Collection Zone-of-the-Enders-HD-Collection] |example 5 = {{Q|Q717600}} → [https://www.trueachievements.com/game/Metal-Gear-Solid-V-The-Phantom-Pain Metal-Gear-Solid-V-The-Phantom-Pain], [https://www.trueachievements.com/game/Metal-Gear-Solid-V-The-Phantom-Pain-Xbox-360 Metal-Gear-Solid-V-The-Phantom-Pain-Xbox-360] |planned use = |number of ids = 6300+ |expected completeness = Q21873974 |formatter URL = https://www.trueachievements.com/game/$1 |external links = https://www.trueachievements.com/game/ |see also = |filter = |robot and gadget jobs = |subpage = TrueAchievements game ID |topic = authority control }} ====Motivation==== {{Q|Q7847301}} is a database of {{Q|Q7889}}, mostly published on Xbox (but also Windows). It also has {{Q|Q1066707}} − I don’t think they warrant their own property though, so I integrate them here (we currently consider DLCs a subclass of video games). A little usage on English Wikipedia. The data model is per platform-realization, so there may be more than one entry for our Q7889 items. [[User:Jean-Frédéric|Jean-Fred]] ([[User talk:Jean-Frédéric|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 18:23, 24 January 2020 (UTC)

* {{comment}} Aaarg, realised there is a numerical ID system which does resolves, eg {{Q|Q25340021}} → [https://www.trueachievements.com/game.aspx?gameid=6599 6599]. However, it does not work for DLCs. Meanwhile, there is a parallel ID system “Product ID”, which has a wider scope (also includes bundles), but does work for both games and DLCs (eg [https://www.trueachievements.com/products/27037 27037])… Not too sure how best to proceed... [[User:Jean-Frédéric|Jean-Fred]] ([[User talk:Jean-Frédéric|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 12:08, 2 April 2020 (UTC)

*: {{re|Jean-Frédéric}} My suggestion would be to edit this property proposal to be for the numeric game ID and then create another for the numeric product ID. [[User:Jc86035|Jc86035]] ([[User talk:Jc86035|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 11:46, 8 April 2020 (UTC)
*Withdrawing this − will likely follow Jc86035 advice and make new proposals. [[User:Jean-Frédéric|Jean-Fred]] ([[User talk:Jean-Frédéric|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 18:30, 28 March 2021 (UTC)
